item.title: Palantir 首席执行官与华尔街互怼，直指银行业务
item.description:
亚历克斯-卡普现在身价 40 亿美元，他的公司刚刚跻身 S&P 500 强。【原文：

Alex Karp is now worth $4 billion, and his company just joined the S&P 500.

】

item.title: Gaw Capital 香港办公楼投标截止日期已过
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，为房地产投资公司 Gaw Capital Partners 拥有多数股权的两座香港写字楼寻找买家的截止日期已经过去。【原文：The deadline has lapsed to find buyers for stakes in two Hong Kong office buildings majority owned by real estate investment firm Gaw Capital Partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊表示将从防御型股票中获利
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师认为，投资者应锁定美国防御性股票的收益，因为这些股票近期的超额收益使其估值显得昂贵。【原文：Investors should lock in gains on US defensive stocks as their recent outperformance has left valuations looking pricey, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称，欧洲银行正在将气候风险考虑到贷款中
item.description: 欧洲银行的最高监管机构表示，欧洲银行正在将气候风险纳入其发放抵押贷款的条款中，尽管它们并不完全了解潜在的成本。【原文：European banks are factoring climate risks into the terms of mortgages they grant, although they don’t fully grasp the potential costs, according to their top regulator.】

item.title: 美联储后股市反弹有可能为大跌添加 "加速燃料
item.description: 虽然股市在期待已久的美联储上周降息后出现反弹，但涨势中也伴随着不安。【原文：While the stock market rallied after the long-awaited Federal Reserve rate cut last week, there’s a sense of unease accompanying the gains.】

item.title: 美银美林加入越来越多看空陷入困境的奢侈品行业的合唱团
item.description: 欧洲奢侈品股票进一步下滑，因为美国银行分析师成为最新一批对这一陷入困境的行业敲响警钟的人，他们将行业领头羊路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的评级下调至中性，并下调了其他公司的评级。【原文：European luxury stocks slid further as Bank of America analysts became the latest to sound the alarm on the beleaguered sector, cutting their rating on industry bellwether LVMH to neutral and downgrading others.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡新领导人如何从马克思主义叛乱走向主流社会
item.description: 20 世纪 80 年代末，阿努拉-库马拉-迪萨纳亚克加入了一个马克思列宁主义政党，该党试图暗杀斯里兰卡领导人并通过武装起义推翻政府。本周日，他通过投票和平地赢得了总统职位。【原文：In the late 1980s, Anura Kumara Dissanayake joined a Marxist-Leninist party that sought to assassinate Sri Lanka’s leaders and overthrow the government in an armed insurrection. On Sunday, he won the presidency peacefully at the ballot box.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司陷入困境后，修复英国下水道泄漏的成本将更加高昂
item.description: 如果以最近的债券销售为鉴，泰晤士水务公司的麻烦将使英国水务行业付出沉重代价。【原文：If recent bond sales are a guide, Thames Water’s troubles are going to cost the UK water industry dearly.】

item.title: 梅洛尼获得意大利预算支持，2023 年债务被下调
item.description: 对意大利数据进行的多年修订将其债务比率降低了近三个百分点，这为准备公布新预算目标的总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府提供了动力。【原文：A multi-year revision of Italy’s data removed almost three percentage points off its debt ratio, offering a boost to premier Giorgia Meloni’s government as it prepares to unveil new budget targets.】

item.title: 投资者消化新内阁，法国债券市场风险骤增
item.description: 法国政府债券落后于同行，因为投资者在权衡米歇尔-巴尼耶总理的新内阁所面临的挑战及其控制国家巨额赤字的能力。【原文：French government bonds lagged peers as investors weighed the challenges to Prime Minister Michel Barnier’s new cabinet and its ability to get the nation’s vast deficit under control.】

item.title: 德国债券收益率曲线自 2022 年以来首次正常化
item.description: 德国收益率曲线的一个关键部分已趋于正常，因为交易员们担心欧洲央行将需要加快降息步伐，因为人们越来越担心该地区的经济复苏已失去动力。【原文：A key segment of the German yield curve has normalized as traders bet the European Central Bank will need to accelerate the pace of interest-rate cuts as concerns grow the region’s economic recovery has run out of steam.】

item.title: 阿里尔投资公司的约翰-罗杰斯谈如何通过价值投资获胜
item.description:
被遗忘已久的选股艺术

The long forgotten art of stock picking

】

item.title: 欧元区私营部门因工厂不景气而重陷萎缩
item.description: 欧元区私营部门经济自 3 月份以来首次出现萎缩，制造业衰退加深，加剧了人们对该地区复苏动力不足的担忧。【原文：The euro area’s private-sector economy shrank for the first time since March, with a deepening manufacturing downturn heightening concerns that the region’s recovery has run out of steam.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格因供应风险和寒冷天气而上涨
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格因供应面临地缘政治风险以及预测供暖季到来前天气将更加寒冷而上涨。【原文：European natural gas prices rose on geopolitical risks to supply and a forecast for colder weather ahead of the heating season.】

item.title: 泰国虚拟银行竞争白热化，竞标者超过许可证数量
item.description: 由于申请数量超过了中央银行计划发放的许可证数量，泰国的虚拟银行竞争日趋白热化。【原文：Thailand’s virtual banking competition is heating up as applications exceeded the number of licenses the central bank’s plans to grant.】

item.title: 西门子将分拆电动汽车充电部门以加速发展
item.description: 西门子股份公司将把电动汽车和卡车充电业务成立为一个完全独立的部门，以寻求新的合作并促进增长。【原文：Siemens AG will set up its electric car and truck charging business as a fully independent unit to pursue new partnerships and boost growth.】

item.title: 欧元区主要经济体的商业活动遭受新的打击
item.description: 欧元区最大的两个经济体的私营部门商业活动在 9 月份出现下滑，原因是德国制造业的困境加剧，而法国的服务业则出现萎缩。【原文：The euro zone’s two largest economies saw private-sector business activity slump in September as Germany’s manufacturing woes worsened and France’s services industry sank.】

item.title: 德国商业银行股价因德国停止进一步出售股票而下跌
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）股价下跌，此前德国表示不会再出售该银行的任何股份，此举表明德国反对意大利竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的任何收购。【原文：Commerzbank AG dropped after Germany said it won’t sell any more shares in the lender, a move signaling its opposition to any takeover by Italian rival UniCredit SpA.】

item.title: 德国商业银行因交易不确定性下跌，欧洲股市低迷
item.description: 欧洲股市从上个月创下的历史高位下滑后，周一保持窄幅震荡。德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）下跌，原因是德国表示不会出售该银行更多股份。【原文：European stocks kept to a narrow range Monday after slipping from last month’s record high. Commerzbank AG slumped as Germany said it won’t sell more shares in the lender.】

item.title: 施普林格-自然》杂志法兰克福 IPO 目标估值 47 亿欧元
item.description: 由私募股权投资支持的学术出版商施普林格-自然公司（Springer Nature）的首次公开募股目标估值高达 47 亿欧元（52 亿美元）。【原文：Springer Nature, the private equity-backed academic publisher, is aiming for a valuation as high as €4.7 billion ($5.2 billion) in its initial public offering.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克称服务业价格比增长缓慢更令人担忧
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克表示，目前服务业通胀持续存在的危险超过了他对经济的担忧。【原文：The European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said the danger of persistent services inflation currently outweighs his concerns over the economy.】

item.title: 印度审计监管机构就针对公司的拟议改革展开讨论
item.description: 一项旨在加强审计师编制包括子公司在内的公司合并财务报表的责任的提案，引发了印度两家会计监管机构之间的冲突。【原文：A proposal aimed at enhancing auditor responsibility for preparing consolidated financial statements of companies, including subsidiaries, has led to a clash between two of India’s accounting regulators.】

item.title: 美国对中国电动汽车软件技术的限制有可能进一步蔓延
item.description: 一些分析人士说，美国计划通过软件和硬件限制进一步限制中国电动汽车，其影响可能超出汽车行业，并可能导致美国在华企业遭到报复。【原文：A US plan that would further limit Chinese electric cars via software and hardware curbs may have ramifications beyond the auto industry and could result in retaliation against US businesses in China, some analysts say.】

item.title: CVC 计划在 Zabka 上市，进行 2021 年以来最大的华沙首次公开募股
item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 正计划对 Zabka Polska SA 进行首次公开募股，这可能是波兰至少三年来最大的首次股票出售。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc is planning an initial public offering in Zabka Polska SA in what could be Poland’s biggest first-time share sale in at least three years.】

item.title: 菲律宾股市将因降息前景迎来牛市
item.description: 菲律宾基准股指上涨，有望在美国和东南亚国家进一步放宽货币政策的前景下进入牛市。【原文：The Philippines’ benchmark stock index gained, poised to enter a bull market on the prospects of further monetary policy easing in the US and in the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 拜登与莫迪宣布印度新建半导体工厂计划
item.description: 美国和印度就在这个南亚国家建立半导体制造厂达成了合作协议，从而推动了印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）促进该国制造业发展的努力。【原文：The US and India reached an agreement to work together on setting up a semiconductor fabrication plant in the South Asian nation, giving a boost to Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s efforts to bolster manufacturing in the country.】

item.title: 法国央行行长支持巴尼耶推动向富人征税
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）对新政府提出的向富人和大公司征税以缓解公共财政紧张的建议表示支持。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau put his weight behind the new government’s proposals to tax the wealthy and large companies to bring urgent relief to stretched public finances.】

item.title: 摩根大通称全球企业热衷于通过并购和首次公开募股在印度发展
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Global companies and financial sponsors are keen to keep exploring both mergers and acquisitions and initial public offerings as they seek to tap into the country’s economic growth, according to top executives from JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在经历六周来最糟糕的一天后有望上涨
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：The London Stock Exchange. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 速报采购经理人指数显示：2024年印度经济扩张速度最慢
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，由于服务业和制造业均出现下滑，2024 年印度经济活动的增长速度最为疲软。【原文：India’s economic activity grew at the weakest pace in 2024 following a drop in both services and manufacturing sector, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】
